name: The Cat Game (whitedr1)
description:
What do a laser pointer, a stadium crowd doing the wave, and cats have in common? Find out in The Cat Game, an action-puzzler where you trick cats into pushing a large ball around a football stadium to reach goals. Get the ball into the spotlights in time? Keep the cats happy. Some cats have special abilities that help or hinder, and it's up to you to decide how to use them.

Team 9 Feline's Project 2 for MSU's MI 445. The team includes:

Justin DeGroat - Designer/Sound

Kalea Vendola - Artist

Yuchen Zhao - Designer

Drew White - Programmer
